software.name: Video Reflex
software.Description: Video Reflex is an Action game, published by Exus, which was released in 1983.

software.name: Vortex
software.Description: Vortex is an Action game, published by Spectravision, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Wabbit
software.Description: You are a farmer trying to protect your crops. One field in particular is giving you trouble. It's surrounded by ten holes from which rabbits dart into your field. Scare off the rabbits by throwing rotten eggs at them, and you may save your carrots.

software.name: Wall Ball
software.Description: Break through the "flat" habit and experience a new dimension in video games. Play with the speed, control, and skill of handball, but without leaving home. Start slow or start fast, but don't be surprised if WALLBALL gives you a good workout! Wallball - 9 levels of 3-D racquet-and-ball simulation for the Atari 2600.

software.name: Wall Break
software.Description: Wall Break is an Action game, published by Homevision, which was released in 1983.

software.name: Wall Defender
software.Description: Wall Defender is an Action game, developed and published by Bomb, which was released in 1983.

software.name: War 2000
software.Description: War 2000 is an Action game, published by Homevision, which was released in 1983.

software.name: War Room
software.Description: War Room is an Action game, published by Probe 2000, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: War Zone
software.Description: War Zone is an Action game, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Warlords
software.Description: Warlords is an Action game, developed and published by Atari, which was released in 1981.

software.name: Warplock
software.Description: At the edge of the galaxy on the fringes of hyperspace and hypertime, your spacecraft is trapped in a bizarre space/time warp. You are engulfed by a band of space pirates bent on destroying you and your crew. It'll take some inside moves with your paddle controller... and skill that's out of this world... to get out of this one!

software.name: Wheel of Fortune
software.Description: Wheel of Fortune is a Miscellaneous game, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Wild Western
software.Description: Wild Western is an Action game, published by Taito Corporation, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Wing War
software.Description: Wing War is an Action game, published by Activision, which was released in 1983.

software.name: Wings
software.Description: Wings is an Action game, published by CBS Electronics, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Winter Games
software.Description: Get ready to capture the Gold in Winter Games. And what an incredible setting - a completely realistic winter wonderland featuring seven action-packed events. You can compete against your friends, or go solo. Train and learn a winning strategy for each event. You can even choose the country you want to represent. Then the competition begins, and the quest for the World Championship. It's all here - the strategy, the challenge, the competition - the art and pageantry of Winter Games!

software.name: Wizard of Wor
software.Description: Outwit and outshoot the Wizard in the dreaded dungeons of Wor! One moment, Worrior. Before you accept this challenge, beware its unique dangers. To survive the first dungeon you must outshoot and vaporize all Burwors. Next, destroy every visible and INvisible Garwor and Thorwor or be eaten... ALIVE! Bulls-eye the winged Worluk before he escapes. DARE NOT freeze at the escape doors. When lightning bolts moving at magical speed appear, take your best aim - it's the angered WIZARD!

software.name: Wolf Fighting
software.Description: Wolf Fighting is an Action game, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Word Games
software.Description: Word Games is an Action game, published by Entex, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Word Zapper
software.Description: The Joystick Controller links you with a most profound vehicle of amusement, the rotary wing Word Zapper. It is armed with vertical and horizontal firing lasers and capable of incredible maneuverability. Opposing you is the Scroll - a diabolic device designed to wear out the wrist and boggle the mind. The Scroll parades the alphabet across the screen, taunting you to duplicate a word or scrambled letters flashed at the bottom of the screen. You must shoot each letter in perfect order, and you must match three words or letter combinations within 99 seconds. Sounds easy? Wait until you meet the Scroll's friends, the Asteroids.

software.name: World Trap
software.Description: World Trap is an Action game, published by Homevision, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Worm War I
software.Description: WORM WAR I has begun. Hordes of giant worms are descending upon the city of Teriyaki! It's up to you, a master tank commander, to skillfully navigate through the ruins and blow away these destructive invaders. Be careful, many a good driver has run out of gas and been wiggled to death under the weight of a giant worm. Lots of luck, commander!

software.name: Wrestling
software.Description: Wrestling is a Sports game, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: X-Man
software.Description: X-Man is an Action game, developed and published by Universal Gamex, which was released in 1983.

software.name: Xenophobe
software.Description: A band of hostile aliens has infested your planet's nine space stations. The security of the entire solar system is at stake. It's up to you and your elite security force to destroy the alien pests and regain control of the space stations. If you fail to save a station, you can still destroy the aliens by blowing up the space station. Just find the secret code and take it to the destruct console. Then hightail it out of there! Each space station contains as many as 5 levels. Search each level for abandoned equipment and food. Swap your Phaser for more powerful weapons to help you blow away more alien fiends!

software.name: Xevious
software.Description: Mission: Seek and destroy XEVIOUS enemy aircraft and bases. Equipment: Fighter plane with laser-pulse anti-aircraft missiles and bombs. Skillfully manuever your fighter through treacherous air space to gain the strike advantage.

software.name: XIV Winter Olympics
software.Description: XIV Winter Olympics is an Action game, published by Mattel, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Yars' Revenge
software.Description: Journey to the Razak Solar System and help the Yars battle an evil enemy! Super flies fight for their lives!

software.name: Z-Tack
software.Description: Z-Tack is an Action game, developed and published by Bomb, which was released in 1983.

software.name: Zaxxon
software.Description: This fantastic 3-dimensional space battle game puts you in control of a futuristic spaceship! Your ship zooms over an alien asteroid, and dives down to attack the enemy's installations. Your ship must avoid hazardous walls, enemy fire, and other unforeseen dangers! Can you survive and score?

software.name: Zenji
software.Description: Zenji is an Action game, published by Activision, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Zookeeper
